医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
对 γδ T 细胞的新见解可以改善结直肠癌的治疗最常见的结直肠癌，微卫星稳定结直肠癌（MSS CRC），目前只能通过现代免疫疗法进行有限程度的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/New-insights-into-ceb3ceb4-T-cells-could-improve-treatment-for-colorectal-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/New-insights-into-ceb3ceb4-T-cells-could-improve-treatment-for-colorectal-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dcc98a48-b5c1-43a7-825f-c8a984909f56 Tue, 27 Aug 2024 14:16:20 -0400 New insights into γδ T cells could improve treatment for colorectal cancer
研究阐明了CDCA7在DNA甲基化中的作用DNA 甲基化是将甲基添加到 DNA 分子的过程，对于维持 DNA 和生物体的整体健康至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Study-Illuminates-CDCA7s-role-in-DNA-methylation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Study-Illuminates-CDCA7s-role-in-DNA-methylation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=85224c19-c850-4d1f-8f6b-47f1913407de Tue, 27 Aug 2024 14:02:22 -0400 Study illuminates CDCA7's role in DNA methylation
研究揭示不同类型的爱如何激活大脑我们在一系列令人眼花缭乱的上下文中使用“爱”这个词——；从性爱到父母之爱或对自然的爱。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Study-reveals-how- different-types-of-love-activate-the-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Study-reveals-how- Different-types-of-love-activate-the-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c699126-e1a0-4b89-92ba-c5e35f21df8e Tue, 27 Aug 2024 13:46:12 -0400 Study reveals how different types of love activate the brain
更年期过渡与血液胆固醇和心血管风险的变化有关在英国伦敦举行的 2024 年 ESC 大会（8 月 30 日至 9 月 2 日）上发表的新研究表明，处于更年期过渡期的女性血液胆固醇谱会发生变化，这可能会对心血管健康产生不利影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Menopause-transition-linked-to-changes-in-blood-cholesterol-and-cardioangio-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Menopause-transition-linked-to-changes-in-blood-cholesterol-and-cardioangio-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d090a64-4d4d-4183-9b4b-dbd8341fdc92 Tue, 27 Aug 2024 13:28:00 -0400 Menopause transition linked to changes in blood cholesterol and cardiovascular risk
新的 ESC 图集数据凸显了心血管疾病死亡率的差异欧洲心脏病学会的最新数据显示，心血管疾病 (CVD) 仍然是欧洲最常见的死亡原因，但尽管 CVD 死亡率普遍下降，但中等收入国家的下降幅度远小于高收入国家。 ESC）心脏病学图谱，发表在《欧洲心脏杂志》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/New-ESC-atlas-data-highlights-disparities-in-cardioangio-disease-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/New-ESC-atlas-data-highlights-disparities-in-cardioangio-disease-mortality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e042501f-9030-4a13-a135-fece295f034c Tue, 27 Aug 2024 13:19:00 -0400 New ESC atlas data highlights disparities in cardiovascular disease mortality
研究揭示了一种对女性健康有重大影响的罕见基因型deCODE Genetics 的科学家和合作者发现了 CCDC201 基因中的一个序列变异，当从父母双方纯合遗传时，该变异会导致更年期平均提前九年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Study-reveals-a-rare-genotype-with-significant-impact-on-womens-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Study-reveals-a-rare-genotype-with-significant-impact-on-womens-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17b93d89-e25d-49a1-aba3-90c632a94fd5 Tue, 27 Aug 2024 13:09:44 -0400 Study reveals a rare genotype with significant impact on women's health
虚拟语音技术增强了 TAVI 患者的后续护理根据 2024 年 ESC 大会上发表的研究，使用虚拟语音技术的临床随访有助于识别经导管主动脉瓣植入 (TAVI) 后的并发症，患者满意度很高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Virtual-voice-technology-enhances-follow-up-care-for-TAVI-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Virtual-voice-technology-enhances-follow-up-care-for-TAVI-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30f0fb35-7794-4730-a190-1043c07d86aa Tue, 27 Aug 2024 12:53:02 -0400 Virtual voice technology enhances follow-up care for TAVI patients
RNA 工程新技术有望实现更持久的治疗加州大学圣地亚哥分校研究人员的一项研究表明，将 RNA 分子塑造成圆形的新方法可能会带来更有效、更持久的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/New-techniques-in-RNA-engineering-promise-longer- permanent-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/New-techniques-in-RNA-engineering-promise-longer- permanent-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf4e634f-d888-40a4-955a-332fa1d3e4e8 Tue, 27 Aug 2024 12:45:40 -0400 New techniques in RNA engineering promise longer-lasting therapies
全球健康专家揭示了人们对饮用水安全的普遍担忧一项新的研究发现，全球接受调查的成年人中有一半以上预计在未来两年内会受到水的严重伤害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Global-health-experts-reveal-widespread-concerns-about-drinking-water-safety.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Global-health-experts-reveal-widespread-concerns-about-drinking-water-safety.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=630532bf-2432-4efe-8856-5b7f440b0bae Tue, 27 Aug 2024 12:24:29 -0400 Global health experts reveal widespread concerns about drinking water safety
关于黑色素瘤细胞如何抵抗癌症免疫疗法的新见解免疫检查点抑制剂是抗癌药物，可帮助免疫系统完成检测和攻击肿瘤细胞的工作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/New-insights-on-how-melanoma-cells-resist-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/New-insights-on-how-melanoma-cells-resist-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b559f75-ef71-4824-b17f-f312c0147cf5 Tue, 27 Aug 2024 11:05:34 -0400 New insights on how melanoma cells resist cancer immunotherapy
